products.name: Sophie - Angelic Sound Engineer
products.description: Rewrote the future of sound. A tribute to fluid identity, synthetic emotion and the power of sound as self-expression.

products.name: Marsha P. Johnson - Resistance Warrior
products.description: Marsha P. Johnson represents the fight for liberation and visibility, now reimagined as a collectible action figure.

products.name: Grace Jones - Warrior Woman From Beyond
products.description: Fearless. Untouchable. Iconic. A fusion of power, performance and presence.

products.name: Vivienne Westwood - Punk Designer
products.description: An icon of rebellion and anti-fashion turned into a powerful collectible. Fashion as protest.

products.name: Sylvia Rivera - Activist Hero
products.description: A fighter for justice and community. This figure honors Sylvia Rivera's legacy as a fearless voice for trans liberation.

products.name: Serena Williams - Power Player
products.description: A symbol of dominance, discipline, and unapologetic strength. This figure celebrates Serena Williams as a game-changer who redefined what power looks likeâ€”on and off the court.

products.name: Billie Jean King - Equality Champion
products.description: More than a tennis legend. A fighter for equal pay and equal rights. This figure honors Billie Jean King's legacy as a pioneer who turned sport into a platform for change.

products.name: Sam Smith - Unapologetic Voice
products.description: A voice that reshaped pop by refusing binaries. This figure represents Sam Smith's emotional honesty and their role in expanding how gender and vulnerability are seen in music.

products.name: Leo Baker - Rule Breaker
products.description: Breaking rules, breaking categories. This figure honors Leo Baker as a trailblazer who challenged the limits of skate culture and gender in professional sports.

products.name: Lady Gaga - Radical Pop Icon
products.description: Art, identity, and performance without limits. This figure captures Lady Gaga's fearless self-expression and her impact as a pop icon who made being different mainstream.
